# The software list

## homebrew

https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/111014448

```shell

/bin/zsh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/cunkai/HomebrewCN/raw/master/Homebrew.sh)"

```

## terminal

```shell
export CLICOLOR=1
export PS1='%1~ %# '
```
